page.title: 11POLICE-DUNTON GREEN/OTFORD
page.content: Our local Dunton Green policeman is P.C. Thacker. His job is to walk round D.G., Riverhead & Chipstead, mainly to protect life & property. He's very well known & is always talking to people about different things. He has changing shifts to suit him, whether it be night-times(10pm-6am) or a day beat. When he's not walking round our area he may be filling in at the police station for men & women away. Sometimes he might go round in the car but he said he preferred walking as he can enjoy the countryside & wildlife as well as be on the lookout for trouble-makers. He carries a truncheon but never seems to use it. In Otford P.C.Tim Clements is making an effort to become known locally.He visits schools,writrs in the Parish magazine & advises on burglar protection.
